nodes.bodyText: Would be better to use Objects.equals(a, b) here to ensure nulls are handled on both sides
I checked, that API appears to be JDK7 so should be valid, I like the suggestion @Arthur-Milchior
Call requires API level 19 (current min is 16): java.util.Objects#equals

I don't think Android Studio supports it.
Worst case: create StringUtil.equals() and note it's deprecated after API 19
